person.persName: John Edward R. Ray (Tennessee Sec. State)

body.p: Memphis, Tennessee, attorney and Secretary of State of Tennessee. South Carolina native. Married Mollie S. Ray. Father of Eddie Ray and Willie Ray. Attorney in Dresden, Tennessee, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Weakely County, Tennessee, in 1850. Attorney and farmer in Memphis in 1860. Appointed Secretary of State of the State of Tennessee by Isham G. Harris from 1859 to 1862.
